name: Shadowed Woods
description:
Controls:
movement: wasd or arrowkeys
aim and shoot: mouse & left mouse button

You awaken to find yourself lost in the heart of the Shadowed Woods, with no memory of how you got there. The forest is dense and foreboding, and the trees seem to loom over you like giant shadows.

As you begin to explore, you realize that something is terribly wrong. It is alive with strange creatures that prey on flesh. Armed only with a pistol, you must survive the night and find a way out of the forest. As you stumble through the forest, you discover that the landscape is constantly shifting , making it difficult to find your way

As the night wears on, you encounter powerful bosses that require all of your skills and resources to defeat. But the clock is always ticking, and you must keep moving if you hope to make it out alive.

Will you survive until dawn and escape the Shadowed Woods, or will you become just another victim of the dark forest's horrors? Only time will tell
